questions.text: What is your favorite clothing style?
What are you shopping for today?
How often do you shop for clothes?

inspiration.preheader: You've made great progress in refining your wardrobe. Let's take it to the next level!
inspiration.hero_image_description: A stylish individual confidently walking through a vibrant cityscape, showcasing their Banana Republic outfit.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We've noticed you haven't been as active with us lately. Remember when you first discovered Banana Republic and how it transformed your style? Let's reignite that passion and explore new possibilities together.

first.template: You've achieved {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} in style milestones with us.
first.fallback: You've achieved significant style milestones with us.

second.fallback: There are exclusive benefits waiting for you to explore.

nostalgia.preheader: From your first purchase to now, we've been with you every step of the way.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A timeline of iconic Banana Republic outfits, showcasing the evolution of style over the years.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've shared some incredible style moments together. From your first purchase to your favorite outfits, Banana Republic has been a part of your journey. Let's continue creating timeless looks.

first.template: You've been a valued member of the Banana Republic family for {{customer.relationship_value}} years.
first.fallback: You've been a valued member of the Banana Republic family for many years.

second.template: You've invested {{customer.lifetime_value}} in creating a wardrobe that reflects your unique style.
second.fallback: You've invested in creating a wardrobe that reflects your unique style.

social_proof.preheader: Our community is thriving, and we want you to be a part of it!
social_proof.hero_image_description: A vibrant community of stylish individuals showcasing their Banana Republic outfits at a social event.
social_proof.first_paragraph: Our community of fashion-forward individuals is growing every day. Don't miss out on the latest trends, exclusive events, and style tips that everyone is talking about.
social_proof.second_title: Be Part of the Fashion Movement

first.template: You're ranked {{customer.community_rank}} in our community of style enthusiasts.
first.fallback: You're a valued member of our community of style enthusiasts.

second.template: Your engagement score of {{customer.engagement_score}} shows how much you love fashion.
second.fallback: Your love for fashion shines through in our community.
